text: Python distutils, how to get a compiler that is going to be used?

For example, I may use "python setup.py build --compiler=msvc" or "python setup.py build --compiler=mingw32"or just "python setup.py build", in which case the default compiler (say, "bcpp") will be used.
How can I get the compiler name inside my setup.py (e. g. "msvc", "mingw32" and "bcpp", respectively)?
: I don't need the default compiler, I need the one that is actually going to be used, which is not necessarily the default one.
So far I haven't found a better way than to parse sys.argv to see if there's a "--compiler..." string there.
